name: Print Shop
overview: Print Shop is a very comprehensive game for managers interested in testing their business acumen. The game spans a period of 12 weeks and each week the player is asked to make decisions on the following: - Number and category of staff to employ. - Amount and type of paper to purchase. - The quotation for each job. - The scheduling of work to the optimum week. The user is shown the results of his decisions in a Trading Account after each week and in the Profit and Loss Account and Balance Sheet after each month. There are three levels of difficulty.
